mapper.select:
select /*+ opt_param('_optimizer_cost_based_transformation', 'off') */ store_cate_detail_pk as storeNo, store_cate_main_fk as storeFk, store_cate_detail_code as code, store_cate_detail_name as name, rownum from store_category_detail_tb
where rownum between #{start} and #{end} order by rownum DESC
